title: France panorama. [No. 72/47]
creator_credit: Societe d'informations Cinematographiques and Gaumont-British Instructional
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: For sportsmen - a new French motorcycle; For space - the D2-B and Meteosat satellites. 2. For consumer defense: A congress - Ralph Nader at the Consumer Congress; A laboratory - the control lab of the Consumer Association. 3. Cultural activities - the Yerres cultural centre. 4. Artistic activities: In the city - the Jean-Louis Barrault Company at the Orsay Terminal; In the country - the Arts Open at Jouy-en-Josas.
